name: HKLM_Image_File_Execution_Options
pattern: {"query": "select name,type,data from registry where key='HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Returns the content of the key HKLM_Image_File_Execution_Options - ATT&CK T1015", "removed": false}
